revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ice Path |image = [[File:Ice Path.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Ice Path. |tokens = 6,000 |location = Between Route 44 and 45, north of Blackthorn City. }} '''Ice Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 120,400 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Jynx.png|40px]] Jynx |- | [[File:Swinub.png|40px]] Swinub |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Delibird.png|40px]] Delibird || <center> 440,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}
==Items== <!--T:6-->
<tabs> <!--T:7--> <tab name="No Debuff">

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
